DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , 6 month open label safety extension study patient willing eligible continue pivotal , double-blind S308.3.001 trial
DOC.brief_title: An Open Label SLV308 Safety Extension Study S308.3.001 Early PD Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients complete S308.3.001 trial Patients medically relevant abnormal finding ( ECG , physical examination , AEs ) end maintenance phase ( visit M6 , week 24 ) study S308.3.001
